title: Guardian naga
data:
{{Obsolete}} {{monster |name=guardian naga |glyph={{LightGreen|N}} |tile=[[File:Guardian naga.png]] |flags={{Spellcaster flag}}
{{See invisible flag}}
{{Actual spells flag}}
{{Warm blood flag}}
{{Speaks flag}} |resistances={{Poison resistance}} |vulnerabilities=none |max_chunks=2 |meat={{Mutagenic corpse}} |xp=457 |holiness={{Natural}} |magic_resistance=-6 |hp_range=24 to 64 |avg_hp=44 |armour_class=6 |evasion=14 |habitat=land |speed=15 |size={{Big}} |item_use={{Open doors}} |attack1=26 ({{Hit type}}: {{Plain flavour}}) |attack2= |attack3= |attack4= |hit_dice=8 |base_hp=3 |extra_hp=5 |fixed_hp=0 |intelligence={{High intelligence}} |genus=naga |species=guardian naga }} {{Flavour|A hybrid; human from the chest up, with a scaly, muscular torso trailing off like that of a snake.}} ==Useful Info== [[Guardian naga]]s are powerful naga warriors found in the lower levels of the [[Snake Pit]] which leave [[mutagenic corpse]]s. Spells: [[Teleport Other]], [[Slow]], [[Venom Bolt]], and [[Minor Healing]]. ==Tips & Tricks== Be careful, they're faster than most nagas. [[Control Teleport]] will make fighting these guys less annoying. ==History== Guardian nagas were removed in [[0.6]] in favor of [[guardian serpent]]s. [[Category:Obsolete monsters]] [[Category:Naga]]
